summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 34th Avenue, from East Pike Street to East Denny Way; 36th Avenue, from East Denny Way to the south line of Waddell's Madrona Park Addition to the City of Seattle; 37th Avenue, from East Denny Way to the south line of Waddell's Madrona Park Addition to the City of Seattle; East Denny Way, from 34th Avenue to 38th Avenue; and East Olive Street from 34th Avenue to 36th Avenue, all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 448 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
